Uses of Interface
org.apache.hadoop.metrics.MetricsContext

  • Packages that use MetricsContext 
    Package Description
    org.apache.hadoop.metrics
    This package defines an API for reporting performance metric information.
    org.apache.hadoop.metrics.ganglia
    Implementation of the metrics package that sends metric data to Ganglia.
    org.apache.hadoop.metrics.jvm  
    org.apache.hadoop.metrics.spi
    The Service Provider Interface for the Metrics API.

      MetricsContext ContextFactory.getContext(String contextName) 
      static MetricsContext MetricsUtil.getContext(String refName, String contextName)
      Utility method to return the named context.
      MetricsContext ContextFactory.getContext(String refName, String contextName)
      Returns the named MetricsContext instance, constructing it if necessary using the factory's current configuration attributes.
      static MetricsContext ContextFactory.getNullContext(String contextName)
      Returns a "null" context - one which does nothing.
      Methods in org.apache.hadoop.metrics that return types with arguments of type MetricsContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<MetricsContext> ContextFactory.getAllContexts()
      Returns all MetricsContexts built by this factory.

      Utility method to create and return new metrics record instance within the given context.
      void Updater.doUpdates(MetricsContext context)
      Timer-based call-back from the metric library.
      Method parameters in org.apache.hadoop.metrics with type arguments of type MetricsContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) Map<String,Map<String,List<MetricsServlet.TagsMetricsPair>>> MetricsServlet.makeMap(Collection<MetricsContext> contexts)
      Collects all metric data, and returns a map: contextName -> recordName -> [ (tag->tagValue), (metric->metricValue) ].

    • Uses of MetricsContext in org.apache.hadoop.metrics.spi

      Classes in org.apache.hadoop.metrics.spi that implement MetricsContext 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractMetricsContext
      The main class of the Service Provider Interface.
      class  CompositeContext 
      class  NoEmitMetricsContext
      A MetricsContext that does not emit data, but, unlike NullContextWithUpdate, does save it for retrieval with getAllRecords().
      class  NullContext
      Null metrics context: a metrics context which does nothing.
      class  NullContextWithUpdateThread
      A null context which has a thread calling periodically when monitoring is started.
